```{r}
library(altair)
```

```{r}
vega_data <- import_vega_data()

data <- vega_data$barley()
```

```{r}
alt$Chart(data)$
  mark_line()$
  encode(
    x='year:O',
    y='median(yield)',
    color='site')$
  properties(
    width=500,
    height=300
)
```
